name: modulus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the distance from zero of a number on a number line: From these numbers you can calculate the modulus. Synonym
absolute value
More examplesFewer examples-1000 or -1000 000 can be described as negative numbers with a large modulus.Some results about modulus can be illustrated by the distance between points on a number line.So the modulus of a complex number is just a generalisation of the modulus you have used previously.
